Question: ut + subjunct.
Answer: in order that, so that, that, in order to, so as to, to
Name: ut + subjunct.

Question: -que
Answer: and, appended to the second of two words
Name: -que

Question: ac, atque
Answer: and also, and even, and in fact
Name: ac, atque

Question: at
Answer: more emotional than sed; but; but mind you; but, you say;
Name: at

Question: dum
Answer: while, as long as, at the same time that
Name: dum

Question: cum
Answer: conj. + subjunct. when, since, although; conj. + indic. when
Name: cum

Question: dummodo
Answer: conj.+ subjunc. provided that, so long as
Name: dummodo
